item.title: Download Doc Compression & Archiving DLL | Aspose.ZIP C# API
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.ZIP to Manipulate Zipped Archives Open NuGet Package Manager within the Microsoft Visual Studio®, search for Aspose.ZIP and install. You may also use the following command within the Package Manager Console. For the detailed instructions please visit the Installation documentation page. Release Notes Download PM> Install-Package Aspose.Zip   Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA

item.title: Aspose.ZIP | Java Library to Compress or Decompress Files & Folders
item.description: Process ZIP files via Java API Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.ZIP for Java is a standalone Java API to create, manipulate, extract & protect archives. Aspose.ZIP for Java class library allows your Java applications to compress/decompress files and folders without getting into the complexity of coding new compression algorithms or understanding the existing ones.

item.title: Compression and archive processing API | Aspose.ZIP Product Family
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.ZIP for Python via .NET from PIP You can easily use Aspose.ZIP for Python from pip with the following command. > pip install aspose-zip   Product Page | Documentation | Demos | Blog | API Reference | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Try our Free Online Apps demonstrating some of the most popular compression and archive-related functionality.

item.title: Aspose.ZIP for Python via .NET 23.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for Python via .NET 23.12. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type ZIPNET-1062 Introduce FastLZ compression. Feature ZIPNET-1084 Encrypt existing ZIP archive without repacking. Feature Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes The following public types were added: Description Aspose.Zip.FastLZ.FastLZStream A stream wrapper that compresses data with FastLZ.

item.title: Aspose.ZIP for Python via .NET 23.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for Python via .NET 23.11. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type ZIPNET-1094 Segment of multi-volume zip does not properly close on flush. Bug ZIPNET-1078 Fix self-extracting archive license for .NET Framework 2.0. Bug ZIPNET-1063 Proper license setting. Bug ZIPNET-1099 Extract multi-volume 7z archive. Feature Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes The following public methods and properties were added: Description Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.ZIP for Python via .NET 23.10 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for Python via .NET 23.10. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type ZIPNET-1087 Store modification time of zip entry. Feature ZIPNET-1076 Store modification time of 7z entry. Feature ZIPNET-1063 Proper license setting. Bug

item.title: Aspose.ZIP for Python via .NET 23.9 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for Python via .NET 23.9. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type ZIPNET-400 Optionally compress 7z header. Feature ZIPNET-1074 Limit the length of zip comment. Bug ZIPNET-1071 Proper license setting. Bug Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes The following public methods and properties were added: Description aspose.

item.title: Aspose.ZIP for Python via .NET 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for Python via .NET 24.1. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type ZIPNET-1112 Extract multi-volume zip archive. Feature ZIPNET-1111 Set proper encoding for some charsets. Bug ZIPNET-1106 New plugins were introduced. Feature Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes The following public methods and properties were added: Description Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.ZIP for Python via .NET 23.7 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for Python via .NET 23.7. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type ZIPNET-1031 Compose XAR archive. Feature ZIPNET-1009 Added Zstandard compression method fpr ZIP container. Feature ZIPNET-1038 Introduce unknown archive format instead of null. Enhancement ZIPNET-1027 Increase bzip2 parallel compression speed. Enhancement ZIPNET-1030 Compress to LZMA2 in 7z in multiple threads.

item.title: Aspose.ZIP for Python via .NET 23.8 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for Python via .NET 23.8. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type ZIPNET-1037 Support tar archives compressed with Zstandard. Feature ZIPNET-1036 Extract WavPack in ZIP container. Feature ZIPNET-1051 Proper work of self-extracting archive with library nearby. Enhancement Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes The following public methods and properties were added: Description Aspose.
